meanings.definition: Involving or designed for more than one player.
meanings.sent1: The multiplayer game allowed friends to play together.
meanings.sent2: The multiplayer mode in the game was very popular.
meanings.sent3: The multiplayer competition was fierce but fun.
meanings.sent4: The multiplayer experience brought people closer together.
meanings.sent5: The multiplayer feature made the game more exciting.

meanings.definition: A game or activity that can be played by more than one person at the same time.
meanings.sent1: We all enjoyed playing the multiplayer on the weekend.
meanings.sent2: The multiplayer was the highlight of the party.
meanings.sent3: The multiplayer brought laughter and joy to the group.
meanings.sent4: The multiplayer was like a symphony of teamwork and fun.
meanings.sent5: The multiplayer created unforgettable memories with friends.
